CLIENT_LIST_TOOLTIP: The file must contain partner ID and GSM information. The GSM should be entered an international number format. (Ex: +905431234567)
EDITABLE_CONDITION: Can only be edited if transaction status has been initializing or ready for delivery
SENDER_ORGANIZATION_TOOLTIP: The Target Domain must be selected first.
SMS_TYPE_TOOLTIP: Customer approval is checked when the marketing option is selected. If permission is given, SMS is sent; otherwise no marketing SMS is sent. Informational SMS does not require any approval and can be sent to anyone.
